title: Unpleasant experiences with Decathlon online shopping
selftext:
I had ordered a product called " HEADLAMP MOONLIGHT USB 500 " on March 11th and the delivery was specified to happen at 18th of March. 18th of March came and there is no news on the item. Logged into the account and saw a delivery failed. There was no communication from the delivery team. No messages, no calls nothing. So Sent an email to customer support and got a response saying they will retry the delivery and asked to wait for 48 hrs. Now one week  has gone by and no update on the product or no further responses from the Decathlon team. (I know the delivery team will be an independent agency but since my contact and payment is with Decathlon, they should atleast make communications with us on the status).

So fed up with this, i went to cancel the order. 

It says the cancellation can be done only when the product is delivered. WHATTTT?

So i dont receive the product ever, then no cancellation that means no refund? no responses from customer support either. WOW.

This made me think, how many more are out there have faced the same situation as me. So i went to their company owned forum and could see lots of folks complaining on the same.

On a company of this stature, their website is a mess.  No status updates, login is a hurdle.

Anyway, folks be safe out there.

&#x200B;

[track panel](https://preview.redd.it/uhbe1l25wgp81.png?width=625&format=png&auto=webp&s=56cb52b36e5e7cc5ded351da8d70598da6c73f60)

&#x200B;

[Cannot cancel the order](https://preview.redd.it/i9ts13v9wgp81.png?width=717&format=png&auto=webp&s=ae30d49699b78a7f7221cad2cc5c1cd3a1cd2ad7)

&#x200B;

[Others in similar situation ](https://preview.redd.it/chflkbfewgp81.png?width=872&format=png&auto=webp&s=92831f14c485a335976165c5b77037945f3435e5)
comments:
In case you are looking to make a complaint, download the consumer app and post the complaint. Consumer forum will make sure that you get your product.

You can then return the item. If they fuck around again, again post the complaint

It's total satisfaction I say. Try it.

I've ordered multiple times via Decathlon, received the product with atleast a week's delay everytime.  
  
But the products were good so I didn't care
Try contacting the courier partner directly, that would be way more helpful.

Same thing is happening with me right now
Did you get the product?
I'm facing exact same thing right now. Their customer care number is a robot, so, it's quite useless talking on that number and email is irresponsive.
